channel.title: Editing and Compiling General Help Please!
channel.description: Ok, I got my server to run on Moparscape :), but still when I run my compile.bat it says cannot find specified path, yet the server works. Now how does editing the server work in brief? I edit the java file while I am logged onto the server or logged off, do I need the compile.bat to be running while I edit or not and etc please share your knowledge realm with me :P.

item.title: Editing and Compiling General Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @uberlol uberlol
item.description:
@uberlol wrote:

waffles that tiny two lines only? as my copiler code?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 02:38:34 PM[/size][hr]log off and compile what does that mean?

Read full topic
item.source: Editing and Compiling General Help Please!

item.title: Editing and Compiling General Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Jagex1 Jagex²
item.description:
@Jagex1 wrote:

you edit the server file whenever you want. you’ve got to log off then compile your server. then your server will be updated.

Read full topic
item.source: Editing and Compiling General Help Please!

item.title: Editing and Compiling General Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Use this as your compiler:

javac *.java pause

Read full topic
